response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and efficiency. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $12,000 to me. Considering its immense potential benefits, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $10,500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic vision. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 10500}
